name: The Rain of Basketballs
description:
The Rain of Basketballs

Made in roughly 72 hours for the 3rd WOWIE!! Game Jam.

Play in full Screen

Everything was made by me except the music which was made by a freind and the sound effects which were obtained from the wowie asset pack.

How to play:

You Play as a basketball net trying to catch 40 of the falling basket balls as possible, but every time you fail to catch a ball, you progress on to a faster spawning rate (speed) of the basketballs. thus making the game harder to win the more you fail. If the game starts out to slow for you, you can always fail to catch some balls on purpose to speed up the spawn rate.
